    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2636</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Juggler and the center of mass.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Jongleur und die Mitte der Masse.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jongleur et le centre de la masse.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um juggler e o centro da massa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un juggler ed il centro di massa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας ζογκλέρ και το κέντρο της μάζας.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un juggler y el centro de la masa.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation of a juggler which demonstrates the pathway and the center of mass/gravity of the objects which he is juggling.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">center of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation eines Jongleurs, der die Bahn und die Mitte
von mass/gravity der Nachrichten demonstriert, die er jongliert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation d'un jongleur qui démontre la voie et le 
centre de mass/gravity des objets qu'il jongle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation de um juggler que demonstre o pathway e o 
centro de mass/gravity dos objetos que juggling.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione di un juggler che dimostra la via ed il 
centro di mass/gravity degli oggetti che sta manipolando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα ενός ζογκλέρ που καταδεικνύει τη 
διάβαση και το κέντρο της μάζας/τη βαρύτητα των αντικειμένων που 
κάνει ταχυδακτυλουργίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación de un juggler que demuestra el camino y el 
centro de mass/gravity de los objetos que él está haciendo juegos 
malabares.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
